name: cyberai
description: **CyberAi (formerly CuberAi)** - AI-Powered Smart Contract Security & Orchestration Platform

scripts.validate: npm run validate:package && npm run validate:docs && npm run validate:scripts
scripts.validate:package: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); console.log('✅ Package valid:', pkg.name, pkg.version);"
scripts.validate:docs: test -d docs && echo '✅ Documentation directory exists' || (echo '❌ Missing docs/' && exit 1)
scripts.validate:scripts: chmod +x scripts/*.sh && echo '✅ Scripts are executable'
scripts.health: npm run validate && echo '✅ Health check passed'
scripts.check:env: test -f .env.example && echo '✅ Environment template exists' || echo '⚠️ No .env.example'
scripts.info: npm run check:node && npm run check:env && npm run docs:count && npm run docs:lines

author: CyberAi Team
